message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $1200000. This exceptional offer is tailored to meet your needs and expectations, considering the value you place on the product. We believe this price reflects the quality and benefits it provides. Let's discuss how we can finalize this transaction.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. This price would allow me to make a significant profit and still be within my budget.

Thank you for your response, Bob. While I understand your position, I must respectfully decline your counteroffer. Our product is highly valued in the market and offers exceptional benefits. To provide further clarity, I would like to propose an adjusted offer of $1100000. This price still allows for a substantial return while reflecting the product's true value. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal.

I appreciate your understanding of the product's value, but I'm still looking for a better price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $950000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I understand your financial constraints. I'm willing to consider a compromise. My counteroffer is $1050000. This price reflects the product's value and allows for a reasonable profit margin. I hope this aligns with your expectations and enables us to move forward with the transaction.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking for a better price. I'm willing to go up to $980000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I've given it careful consideration, and I'm pleased to present a counteroffer of $1025000. This price reflects the product's value and allows for a fair profit margin. I hope this offer meets your expectations and paves the way for a successful transaction.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $990000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. My counteroffer is $1010000. This price still reflects the product's value and allows for a reasonable profit margin. I hope this aligns with your expectations and brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
